College_Summary: Andhra Polytechnic College is one of the fastest-growing colleges located at Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh and was established in year 1946 by state government of Madras. The College offers Diploma courses in different specializations and all programmes are approved by AICTE. The admission in the programme is on the basis of entrance test.

The college offers 7 types of specialized courses like B.Tech, BA, B.Sc, Diploma + B.Tech. Admission to these courses is based on merit and the application mode is both online and offline.

College_Summary: SMVM Polytechnic College was established in the year 1958 and is affiliated to SBTET. All the courses are approved by AICTE. The College provides diploma courses in the subjects of Engineering. The admission is based on the merit of 10+2 qualifying examination.

Behara Polytechnic College is a recognized chief institution of technical education, which was founded in the year 2012, is a privately owned diploma college, and is approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

College_Summary: Smt B. Seetha Polytechnic College was established by Shri Vishnu Educational Society in 1997 at Bishnupur, Bhimavaram, West Godavari District, Andhra Pradesh with a vision to provide quality Technical Education to the Rural Students. The Institute provides Diploma Courses in 4 Disciplines across 1 stream.

Sri Jyothi Polytechnic was established in 2013 with the vision of providing Quality Technical Education to all. The college is affiliated with the State Board of Technical Education and Training and is approved by AICTE. Previously, the institute used to offer Diploma courses in three disciplines across 1 stream which is now increased to Diploma courses in five Disciplines across 1 stream.

A.A.N.M & V.V.R.S.R Polytechnic was established in 1981 in Gudlavalleru at Krishna District, Andhra Pradesh. The institution, which is spread over 10 acres, offers diploma courses in Engineering and Technology. Presently, it offers 7 courses in fields like Civil Engineering, Applied Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electronic & Communication Engineering, Electrical & Electronic Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Information Technology. The duration of the diploma courses is 3 years and the institution operates two shifts for all the diploma courses. Candidates have to clear POLYCET and get a decent ranking to get admitted into the diploma course offered here.

ESC Government Polytechnic College (ESCGPC) is a top Polytechnic Institution in the state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Nandyal and was established in 1960. The College is affiliated with the State Board of Technical Education and Training and approved by All India Council For Technical Education (AICTE). The College provides a Diploma Degree in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical and Electronics and Electronics and Communication Engineering.

Government Polytechnic located at Anakapalle was established in the year of 2008 and turned out to be one of the best polytechnic colleges in the Andhra Pradesh State. The college is well-known for its academics via its two diploma courses along with its integrity and accomplishment in numerous fields sports, community services, and extra- curricular activities, etc. Since its establishment, the college has put robust efforts to maintain the decorum and helpful atmosphere in the foundation. They provide systematic training and latest technology for the overall development of students.

Government Polytechnic, Vijayawada (GP Vijayawada) was established with a vision of providing excellent technical knowledge and skills at the Diploma level to provide highly competent resources. The institute offers diploma courses in 6 streams in the Engineering discipline only.

Established in the year 2009, Narayana Polytechnic is the first private Polytechnic college in the district of Srikakulam. It offers diploma courses for various Engineering branches. Admissions to this college are strictly based on merit through the AP POLYCET entrance examination. Candidates have to fill the application form online mode only.

Government Polytechnic College, Anantapur was established in 1960 in Andhra Pradesh. The institute currently offers Diploma courses in 5 Engineering specializations. The selection procedure is completely merit-based through AP POLYCET exam marks for their admission. Candidates who have passed the 10th examination are eligible to apply for admission and entrance test.

Government Polytechnic Simhadripuram is a premier technical educational institution, located in the Simhadripuram district of Andhra Pradesh. The college offers diploma level courses in 5 Engineering disciplines. The College has its affiliation to the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Hyderabad, while the courses are operational based on an approval from AICTE, New Delhi. The aspirants looking forward to take admission in the college must appear in the Polytechnic Common Entrance Test (POLYCET) organized every year by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Andhra Pradesh at Vijayawada.

Sanketika Polytechnic (SPT) is one of the premier institutions of Andhra Pradesh, located at the heart of Visakhapatnam. The institute was established as a part of Sanketika mini-University which comprises 2 engineering colleges, a polytechnic, and two sub-departments in Management and Computer Applications. The institute offers diploma courses in six different streams to the eligible students. The admission to this institute is based on the ranking secured in AP POLYCET, conducted by AP Polytechnic admissions board. The institute aims at equipping the students with the necessary technical knowledge, analytical skills, and expertise to apply it.

Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Tirupati is a public research and education institute, located in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh, India. It was established in 2015 as an autonomous institute that was set up by the Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India.

It offers diploma courses in the field of engineering. The admission processes of counselling and seat allotment are administered by the State Board of technical education after the conduct of AP Polytechnic Common Entrance Test (AP POLYCET).

College_Name: Damacharla Anjaneyulu Government Polytechnic Ongole, Prakasam
College_Summary: Damacharla Anjaneyulu Government Polytechnic Ongole at Prakasam was established on 1982 by the efforts of Government of Andhra Pradesh. Initially, the institution was started with 3 diploma courses and but now, the college is providing 4 courses with an annual intake of 60 seats in each branch. Ranking secured in the AP POLYCET will be considered for the diploma admission. On-Campus placements are being arranged by inviting the reputed firms. The students get selected by the companies and firms at their Final year itself.

College_Summary: Rao’s College of Pharmacy (RCP), Nellore is a private institution established in 2004 affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University. Approved by the Pharmacy Council of India, the college offers undergraduate, postgraduate, doctorate and diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy. Admission in the college is done on the basis of the marks scored in the previous qualifying discipline. The college has highly qualified and well experienced faculty members.

The college offers postgraduate degrees, integrated courses and PG diploma in disciplines such as Science, Social Work, Journalism, Tourism and Management. Admissions are on the basis of merit and entrance tests conducted by the university. CTUAP currently functions as a transit campus.

College_Name: Bharatiya Engineering Science & Technology Innovation University - [BESTIU], Anantapur
College_Summary: Bharatiya Engineering Science and Technology Innovation University (BESTIU) is situated in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh and was established in 2019. It offers UG & PG courses like B.Tech, MBA, B.Sc, BA, B.Sc {Hons.}, BBA, BBA + MBA, B.Des, M.Sc, M.A, M.Tech, Ph.D, M.Phil, Executive, Diploma, and Certification. The admission to these courses is based on BEE (BESTIU Entrance Exam). The application mode is both online and offline.

VIT-AP School of Law (VSL), Guntur is one of India’s leading academic institutions. VSL offers distinctive education through its Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Ph.D. Programs, approved by the Bar Council of India (BCI). The students will get an opportunity to develop highly effective research and writing skills from the first semester onwards with a Comprehensive Legal Research Writing Program.

College_Summary: Some of the important highlights of the GITAM Institute of Nursing are mentioned below:

Gitam University offers Distance education which is approved by UGC and DEB as well. Distance education in this university came into existence in 2009. It offers various levels of degree programs such as Diploma, Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs. Some of the courses that are offered are Diploma in communicative English, Diploma in Computer application, BA, Bcom, MBA etc.

GEMS B School, Visakhapatnam is awarded the “Most Preferred B School for Placements” 2020 by ASSOCHAM. It is one of the renowned and sought-after institutes for management. Students have been successfully placed in well-known companies such as Cisco, Yahoo, Oracle, ICICI Bank, Hinduja, TATA, HDFC Bank, HSBC Bank, Dell, etc. The college offers 11 different MBA courses, an International MBA program in London and UG courses under various disciplines. Admission is done on the basis of marks obtained in the entrance test conducted by the institute.

Ambedkar College of Technology & Science (ACTS) Degree College, Visakhapatnam comes under the aegis of Ambedkar People’s Educational Trust. The college offers UG courses in the disciplines of Business, Commerce and Science. Admissions are done on the basis of merit.

College_Summary: Rao’s Degree College, established in 1992 is a constituent college of the Rao’s Group of Institutions. This degree college offers BBA, BSc, BCA and BCom courses at the UG level. Admission to the courses offered by Rao’s Degree College, Nellore is done based on the candidate’s performance in the qualifying examination.

College_Name: Rao's Institute of Management Studies, Nellore
College_Summary: Rao’s Institute of Management Studies (RIMS), Nellore was established in 2003. This institute is one of the most renowned educational institutions of the state and is run under the Rao’s Educational Society. It is affiliated to Sri Venkateswara University and is approved by AICTE, New Delhi. RIMS Nellore offers a full-time MBA program. Admission to the MBA course is done based on the candidate’s performance in national level entrance exams like CAT/ MAT/ XAT, etc.

Sanjeevani Degree College, Venkatachalam is a constituent college of the Rao’s Group of Institutions. This college is affiliated to the SVU, Tirupati and approved by UGC. The college offers BBA, BSc, BCA and BCom courses at the UG level. Admission to the courses offered by Sanjeevani Degree College, Venkatachalam is done based on the candidate’s performance in the qualifying examination.

College_Name: Rao's Institute of Computer Science, Venkatachalam
College_Summary: Rao’s Institute of Computer Science, a constituent college of the Rao Group of Institutions was established in 1996. Rao’s Institute of Computer Science offers MSc, MCom and MCA programs at the postgraduate level. In order to be eligible for admission to these courses, students must hold a Bachelor’s degree in relevant discipline from a recognized university. Admission to these programs will be done based on the candidate’s score in the last qualifying exam.

College_Name: Velankanni Institute of Management Studies, Venkatachalam
College_Summary: Velankanni Institute of Management Studies (VIMS), Nellore was established in 1999 and is affiliated to Sri Venkateswara University, Tirupati. VIMS offers an MBA program at the PG level. Admission to the MBA is done based on the candidate’s performance in national level entrance exams like CAT/ MAT/ XAT, etc. Additionally, the college has a dedicated Training and Placement cell that provides placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters are Aditya Birla Capital, Muthoot Finance, HCL, Reliance Jio, IBM, Dell, Cognizant, etc. Check: VIMS Nellore Placement

College_Name: Velankanni Institute of Computer Science, Venkatachalam
College_Summary: Velankanni Institute of Computer Science is a private institution established by Rao's Group of Educational Institutions. Velankanni Institute offers PG courses in Computer Science such as MCA, M.Sc in Computer Science and M.Com. Admission to these courses is made on the basis of the candidate’s performance in the last qualifying examination. Institute has a dedicated Training and Placement cell which provides placement assistance to the students.

Akshara Institute of Management and Technology, Tirupati
College_Summary: Akshara Institute of Management & Technology, Tirupati is a private institute affiliated to SVU, Tirupati and approved by AICTE. It offers a 2 years full time MBA program in various disciplines. Admission to the Akshara Institute will be done based on the candidate’s performance in national or state level entrance examination as per the policy of the State Govt./ University.

College_Name: Sri Dasari Narayana Rao Govt Degree College for Women, Palakol
College_Summary: Sri Dasari Narayana Rao Government Degree College for Women was established in 1982 by Palakol Education Society. The college is funded by the Government of Andhra Pradesh and affiliated to Adikavi Nannaya University. It is the first Government Degree college for women in the district. SDNR Government Degree College for Women initially offered only B.A & B.Com courses with Telugu as medium of instruction.

Waltair Business School, Visakhapatnam, is a private institute which provides BBA and MBA courses in various disciplines at the UG and PG level. Admission is done based on merit in the previous qualifying exam. The aim of Waltair is to prepare students for leadership excellence by inculcating active learning strategies with a mix of practical Industry experiences and lead them to success.

Vinex Degree College, established in 2000, is a private institution affiliated with Andhra University. With the guidance of its Founder, Vinex has always been dreaming big and living those dreams successfully. Vinex offers undergraduate courses including Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Business Administration, etc. It also provides IAS Coaching for INR 1.75 Lacs as well as BBA + IAS Coaching for INR 20,000.

GATE College, Tirupati was established in 1998 under the aegis of GATE Educational Trust. It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and is affiliated to Sri Venkateswara University. GATE College aims at training young people to be quality leaders to bring the desired changes for the betterment of the people of our country.

BV Raju College, Bhimavaram, established in 1999, is a private institute affiliated to the Adikavi Nannaya University and accredited by NAAC. The college offers various Certificate, UG and PG courses in diverse fields. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the student’s performance in the last qualifying examination. There are a total of 18 faculty members in the college and most of them are Ph.D. holders.

The college offers B.Sc. program in eight disciplines, B.Com. in two disciplines and M.Sc. in two disciplines at the UG and PG level.

College_Summary: Dr. CSN Degree and P.G. Bhimavaram College, established in 1994, is a private college affiliated to Adikavi Nannaya University and approved by AICTE, NCTE. The college offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Science, Arts, Commerce, Management.

College_Summary: Rise Krishna Sai Prakasam Group of Institutions, established in 2009 by the Rural Institute of Social and Economic Empowerment (RISE) and is affiliated to JNTUK, Kakinada. College_Summary: Westin College of Hotel Management was established in 1999 and has become a leading school of hospitality learning in Hyderabad and Vijayawada. Since its inception, the college has grown by leaps and bounds offering the best hospitality education in this part of the country and thereby achieving the brand image for the past 22 years. This experience makes Westin an excellent choice for a high quality education at Intermediate, Undergraduate and Graduate level. Westin has a highly competent and committed team having vast experience in industry and teaching.

College_Summary:
Chennais Amirta International Institute of Hotel Management (CAIIHM) was established in 2010. It is one of the leading hotel management institutions spread across southern India in 4 major metro cities. With a sprawling 10+ acre campus in Chennai and 4 more campuses in Bangalore, Balkampet (Hyderabad), Khairtabad (Hyderabad) and Vijayawada is the only institution to provide world-class infrastructure and cultivated comprehensive education for its students. Chennais Amirta offers up to 90% industry-oriented practical classes with over 500 experienced faculty.
The UG, PG and Diploma programs namely BSc Hotel Management, and Diploma and MBA in different streams, cater to students’ preferences and eligibility. The institution is affiliated with major universities and councils such as Alagappa University, Osmania University, Singhania University, Institute of Professional Development (Open University - Malaysia), Jawaharlal Nehru Technical Education- Council of Skill Development, Bharat Sevak Samaj for offering different programs.
